<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each natural loop with multiple exit blocks, this pass creates a new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block N such that all exiting blocks now branch to N, and then control flow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is redistributed to all the original exit blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Limitation: This assumes that all terminators in the CFG are direct branches</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             (the &quot;br&quot; instruction). The presence of any other control flow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             such as indirectbr, switch or callbr will cause an assert.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64" lineLink="#af789701014d452a6764baa46d6afa7e0"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#aaa970fc931c1c63037a8182e028d04b1">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS&#95;BEGIN</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-unifyloopexits-cpp-/unifyloopexitslegacypass/#ad2c6666f9150c2a42fd6d58dde6fd3b9">UnifyLoopExitsLegacyPass</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;unify-loop-exits&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Fixup each natural loop to have a single exit block&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#a14724f1ccf528e73bb29bc9230737967">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS&#95;DEPENDENCY</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreewrapperpass">DominatorTreeWrapperPass</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#a14724f1ccf528e73bb29bc9230737967">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS&#95;DEPENDENCY</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfowrapperpass">LoopInfoWrapperPass</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="#a00410754617181d2a4693f9763c488ea"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#a74ce8276b89067e806f67c45a6d92575">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS&#95;END</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-unifyloopexits-cpp-/unifyloopexitslegacypass/#ad2c6666f9150c2a42fd6d58dde6fd3b9">UnifyLoopExitsLegacyPass</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;unify-loop-exits&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Fixup each natural loop to have a single exit block&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71" lineLink="#a889d7f30f6c65b4b325c18f14f4272c3"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42; Only looks at CFG &#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42; Analysis Pass &#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The current transform introduces new control flow paths which may break the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SSA requirement that every def must dominate all its uses. For example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// consider a value D defined inside the loop that is used by some instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// U outside the loop. It follows that D dominates U, since the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// program has valid SSA form. After merging the exits, all paths from D to U</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// now flow through the unified exit block. In addition, there may be other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// paths that do not pass through D, but now reach the unified exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block. Thus, D no longer dominates U.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Restore the dominance by creating a phi for each such D at the new unified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop exit. But when doing this, ignore any uses U that are in the new unified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop exit, since those were introduced specially when the block was created.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The use of SSAUpdater seems like overkill for this operation. The location</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for creating the new PHI is well-known, and also the set of incoming blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the new PHI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89" lineLink="#aaaff4f2206ebf29a0a8e629835ca1973"><span class="doxyHighlight">static </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aaaff4f2206ebf29a0a8e629835ca1973">restoreSSA</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;&gt; &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/incoming">Incoming</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;LoopExitBlock) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">InstVector = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 8&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">IIMap = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapvector">MapVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, InstVector&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  IIMap ExternalUsers;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BB : L-&gt;blocks()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    for (auto &amp;I : &#42;BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">      for (auto &amp;U : I.uses()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">        auto UserInst = cast&lt;Instruction&gt;(U.getUser());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">        auto UserBlock = UserInst-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (UserBlock == LoopExitBlock)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">          continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (L-&gt;contains(UserBlock))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">          continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;added ext use for &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; I.getName() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;(&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          &lt;&lt; UserBlock-&gt;getName() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;)&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> : ExternalUsers) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each Def used outside the loop, create NewPhi in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopExitBlock. NewPhi receives Def only along exiting blocks that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dominate it, while the remaining values are undefined since those paths</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// didn&#39;t exist in the original CFG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;externally used: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;getName() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewPhi =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#af4aba918a76ca15bde1be3e14572e475">PHINode::Create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>-&gt;getType(), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/incoming">Incoming</a>.size(),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144" lineLink="#a91d961bc77edfba4fb721c6637c0c6ed"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a91d961bc77edfba4fb721c6637c0c6ed">unifyLoopExits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To unify the loop exits, we need a list of the exiting blocks as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// well as exit blocks. The functions for locating these lists both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// traverse the entire loop body. It is more efficient to first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// locate the exiting blocks and then examine their successors to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// locate the exit blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> ExitingBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  L-&gt;getExitingBlocks(ExitingBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"></CodeLine>
